titles.title: Twenty First Sunday in Ordinary Time - Year C Psalms

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Go into all the word
and preach the Gospel.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O praise the Lord,
all you nations;
acclaim him,
all you peoples!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For his merciful love
has prevailed over us;
and the Lord's faithfulness
endures forever.
